summarization_complaint_desc.submitted_value: Ms. Chen alleges she was unfairly denied selection for the internal 'Future Leaders Program' announced in February 2024. She believes her non-selection was due to her age (52), citing comments made by Mr. Miller and the selection of a significantly younger colleague.

summarization_policy_section.description: Policy Section is summarized (non-empty, non-placeholder, >10 chars)
summarization_policy_section.submitted_value: Selection for company-sponsored development programs is based on factors including performance history, demonstrated potential, skills alignment, operational requirements, and business needs. All selection decisions must be non-discriminatory, without regard to age or any other characteristic protected under applicable law.

key_issues_identified.description: Key inconsistencies/missing info identified (Comment contradiction AND Email issue)
submitted_value: Ms. Chen reported Mr. Miller commented the program was for 'younger employees'; Mr. Miller denied making this specific comment, recalling a discussion of 'long-term potential impact'.
Ms. Chen stated she sent a follow-up email to Mr. Miller regarding his comments and selection criteria; Mr. Miller did not recall receiving such an email.
The follow-up email Ms. Chen reportedly sent to Mr. Miller was not provided, as Ms. Chen stated she could not locate it immediately during her interview.
